TopicTitle: CR-7 R.A.P.I.E.R. engine ISPVac reported incorrectly

Articles.Content:
Reported Version: v0.1.4 (latest) | Mods: none | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 Home 22H2 | CPU: AMD Ryzen 7 7800X3D | GPU: MSI Gaming GeForce RTX 4080 16GB GDDR6X PCI Express 4.0 | RAM: 128 GB DDR5-6000

 

The CR-7 R.A.P.I.E.R. engine ISPVac is reported to be 3,200s which is the same as the "ISP1 atm" figure. When you are in the vacuum of space, it switches to closed cycle (before actually) and in this state, the ISP reads as 305s.

When selecting engines, the player will want to know the ISP in a Vacume during the VAB design stage. I would expect this value to display 305s.

Edited August 30, 2023 by Anth12
